name: Glorya's Glory
description:
It still doesn't attend the theme, but when finished, the scream will serve the purpose of double jumping, attacking in all directions, managing your breath(which is also your health meter) to not die in one hit.

Run on Windows.

Engine used: Godot, addins TileSetHelper.

Contributors : KodaDono and Lenninsk

By honor, we respected the time limited and !finished the game
